availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Mackey (Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Nelson County, Kentucky, farmer. Mississippi native. Married Lucinda Conner Mackey in Nelson County, Kentucky on January 25, 1838. Father of Walter Mackey, Susan Mackey, Mary Mackey, Rodney Mackey, John Mackey, Margaret Mackey, and Wallace Mackey. Farmer in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1850. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned nineteen enslaved persons in Nelson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 619.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, District 1, p. 209.Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, p. 178.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Nelson County, p. 116.Kentucky Marriage Records, Nelson County Courthouse, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film 000481488.
